pkgmetadata.longdescription: Algorithms for Class Distribution Estimation // Quantification is a prominent machine learning task that has received an increasing amount of attention in the last years. The objective is to predict the class distribution of a data sample. This package is a collection of machine learning algorithms for class distribution estimation. This package include algorithms from different paradigms of quantification. These methods are described in the paper: A. Maletzke, W. Hassan, D. dos Reis, and G. Batista. The importance of the test set size in quantification assessment. In Proceedings of the Twenty-Ninth International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence, IJCAI20, pages 26402646, 2020. doi:10.24963/ijcai.2020/366.
